messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Hello crew, remember to set your suit sensors and have a safe shift

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Giggles the Clown is a Criminal.. Who ever finds him and arrests him will recieve a large reward of cash..

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We have someone working on restoring power, calm down before we have to start breaking out the stunbatons

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Oh crap, get the mop.

Meaty ores have been detected on collision course with the station.
